answers.answer: I'm currently 28 weeks pregnant risk of pre-eclampsia due to hypertension b4 pregnancy blood pressure controlled on meds no protein in urine had to go to hospital Tuesday bcuz blood pressure was high but checked out fine just increased meds and baby is measuring fine at this point hope everything works out for u they may have to induce if meds can't get BP down
And yes ur baby can be born healthy

I had preeclampsia with my first 9 years ago. I started getting in at 7 months. I took bp medication which kind if controlled it but I still had protein issues. Many hospital stay, 24 hour urine collection and NST later, I had my son at 39 by being induced. He was perfect =) Now im 35 weeks with #2 and have high blood pressure not related to pregnancy but still high risk if getting it again.
Thank you so much ladies, im stressed out.hope everything goes well with all of us.

question: I'm 34 weeks but my baby sizevas 32 weeks, and my doctor find out i have preeclempsia(blood pressure around 145/90 and protein release from rhe urine.Im taking pills for reducing the blood pressure and nothing else.Does someone have the same problem, or did someone have it before? How far went your pregnancy?could you have a healthy baby?
title: preeclempsia
